mutants.original_line: s = ''.join(c for c in s if c.isalpha() and c.isupper())  # Filter out non-alphabetic characters and lowercase letters
mutants.mutated_line: s = 'MUTATED'.join((c for c in s if c.isalpha() and c.isupper()))
